caption: Two men are in a room, smoking and having a conversation. In front of them is a table with some food. One of the men is eating from a bowl. The man eating puts down his plate and leaves through the door, leaving the other man smoking. Outside the police station, a man gets into a black Mercedes car. A woman gets out of the car, and they switch seats. The black car drives away from the police station. A man walks through a bustling city with a paper bag in hand. He's wearing black sunglasses. He enters a room where many people are playing musical instruments. He raises a gun and shoots one of them, leaving the floor covered in blood.

breakpoint.answer: A man is shot dead on the ground.
